about_the_game:
# Enigma Of Forest

4v1 Werewolf Hunt Multiplayer Horror Game Unveil the mysteries of the darkness and prepare to survive!
Enigma Of Forest: Delve into the forest with a group of 5 friends and witness the horrors of nature.
But this innocent exploration will turn into a nightmare as one of you succumbs to a terrible curse. One of you is now a werewolf!
Cooperate to survive: You will need to work together to find out who the werewolf is and escape its savage attacks.
Follow clues, set traps, and trust each other to solve the mysteries of the darkness.Each game is a different experience: Procedurally generated maps and random events make each game unique.
You will never know what you are going to face, which will increase the tension and excitement.
Feel the tension and fear: Atmospheric sounds and terrifying visuals will rip your heart out and make you feel like a monster is lurking around every corner.
Enigma Of Forest offers you:4v1 co-op horror experience Procedurally generated maps and random eventsTense and terrifying atmosphere
The challenge of working together with your friends to surviveThe mystery of finding out who the werewolf is Step into the darkness with courage and fight to survive!
